short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enables color inversion on Google Meet and Slack Huddles, allowing a light-to-dark theme toggle for better readability.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tailored for users viewing code editors on shared screens, this extension provides the ability to invert colors on Google Meet and Slack Huddles, facilitating a toggle between light and dark themes for improved readability.
